scripts.release:latest:major: npm version major && npm run tag && npm run publish:latest
scripts.release:latest:minor: npm version minor && npm run tag && npm run publish:latest
scripts.release:latest:patch: npm version patch && npm run tag && npm run publish:latest
scripts.release:next:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version premajor && npm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version preminor && npm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version prepatch && npm run publish:next
scripts.release:next:update: npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease && npm run publish:next
scripts.test:ci_all: npm run test:ci_fixtures && npm run test:ci_browser
scripts.test:ci_browser: npm install puppeteer@^0.12.0 && npm run test:browser
